question:
Match the contents of List-I with List-II

| List-I | List-II |
|---|---|
| (a) Bioreactors | i. Insulin produced by rDNA technology |
| (b) Downstream processing | ii. Vessels which convert raw material into specific Product |
| (c) Recombinant protein | iii. Detect mutated genes in suspected cancer patient |
| (d) PCR | iv. Involves separation and purification |
explanation: Bioreactors (ii) are vessels for production. Downstream processing (iv) involves separation/purification. Recombinant protein (i) is Insulin. PCR (iii) detects mutations.
